attributes.action: Close down universities immediately due to enormous increase in COVID-19 cases
attributes.additional_details: COVID-19 cases in the UK increased dramatically in a few days . New strain of COVID-19 was found and evidence shown that the new strain of COVID-19 is 70% more contagious and transmissible.
attributes.background: Classes should go online until the virus is no longer a threat.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
